description: 💬 基于 LLM 大语言模型的知识库问答系统。开箱即用，支持快速嵌入到第三方业务系统，1Panel 官方出品。

ArbitrageLab is a python library that enables traders who want to exploit mean-reverting portfolios by providing a complete set of algorithms from the best academic journals.
All Algorithms implemented in Python
Set of tools to assess and improve LLM security.
Add memory, knowledge and tools to LLMs

为GPT/GLM等LLM大语言模型提供实用化交互接口，特别优化论文阅读/润色/写作体验，模块化设计，支持自定义快捷按钮&函数插件，支持Python和C++等项目剖析&自译解功能，PDF/LaTex论文翻译&总结功能，支持并行问询多种LLM模型，支持chatglm3等本地模型。接入通义千问, deepseekcoder, 讯飞星火, 文心一言, llama2, rwkv, claude2, moss等。
Open source ngrok alternative designed for teams
An efficient, flexible and full-featured toolkit for fine-tuning large models (InternLM2, Llama3, Phi3, Qwen, Mistral, ...)
[CVPR 2023] SadTalker：Learning Realistic 3D Motion Coefficients for Stylized Audio-Driven Single Image Talking Face Animation
MuseTalk: Real-Time High Quality Lip Synchorization with Latent Space Inpainting
MiniCPM-V 2.0: An Efficient End-side MLLM with Strong OCR and Understanding Capabilities
Inference code for Llama models

CISO Assistant is an open-source one-stop-shop for GRC - Risk and Audit Management supporting +30 standards and frameworks: NIST CSF, ISO 27001, NIS2, SOC2, PCI DSS, CMMC, PSPF, GDPR, HIPAA, Essential Eight, NYDFS-500, DORA, NIST AI RMF, CyFun, AirCyber and so much more
